title: cmd/godoc: m=src no longer works
body:
by **bgarcia@golang.org**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
  In a recent godoc instance, add "?m=src" to the end of a package
  documentation URL.
  ex: http://golang.org/pkg/unicode/?m=src
  (at time of writing, golang.org is too old to illustrate bug in HOL).

What is the expected output? What do you see instead?
  Expect to see source code of all files that make up the package.
  Instead, no source code is displayed.

Please use labels and text to provide additional information.
  This was most likely broken by:
  https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=1666da2583f4f2aab3708f424f128123c4dc4115&;repo=tools
  https://golang.org/cl/52750044
